ch0089_90_n/0101_0701_01_10:
Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’ve been waiting
for you.
ch0089_90_n/0101_0701_02_10:
Please, show me the love you and your friends
share!
ch0089_90_n/7101_0701_01_10:
Arceus is a Pokémon that supposedly created
this world.
ch0089_90_n/7101_0701_02_10:
A formula for creating the world... I wonder how
beautiful that’d be!
ch0089_90_n/7102_0701_01_10:
This power we’ve awakened is born from the love
we humans and Pokémon share.
ch0089_90_n/7102_0701_02_10:
In the past, I tried to separate people and 
Pokémon.
ch0089_90_n/7102_0701_03_10:
But now, I think people and Pokémon should stay
by each other’s side.
ch0089_90_n/7103_0701_01_10: When I battle in this outfit, I feel more poised.
ch0089_90_n/7103_0701_02_10: And Zoroark and I can unleash more power.
ch0089_90_n/7103_0701_03_10:
I suppose it’s only possible because of our love for
our friends.
ch0089_90_n/7104_0701_01_10:
Even if you tried measuring my and Zoroark’s
power now...
ch0089_90_n/7104_0701_02_10: no formula or calculation could express it.
ch0089_90_n/7105_0701_01_10:
More than ever, I’ve been thinking about
humans—people like you and everyone else,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0089_90_n/7105_0701_02_10: In the past, I cared only about Pokémon.
ch0089_90_n/7105_0701_03_10: But now, I think about Pokémon AND humans.
ch0089_90_n/7105_0701_04_10: I owe it all to you and the others.
ch0089_90_n/1701_0701_01_10: Good timing. Here, this is for you.
ch0089_90_n/1701_0702_01_10: I look forward to seeing you excel.
ch0089_90_n/2501_0701_01_10:
My friend, Zoroark, cares deeply for his
companions.
ch0089_90_n/2501_0701_02_10:
One time, when Team Break was causing trouble
at a festival, he got angry on behalf of a friend of
ours.
ch0089_90_n/2501_0701_03_10:
I’m truly blessed to have a friend like Zoroark by
my side.
ch0089_90_n/2501_0702_01_10: Treasuring friends comes naturally to Zoroark.
ch0089_90_n/2501_0702_02_10:
I hear that even in the wild, Zoroark conjure
illusions to protect comrades from enemies.
ch0089_90_n/2501_0702_03_10:
What a great Pokémon, full of love for its friends.
Wouldn’t you agree?
ch0089_90_n/2511_0701_01_10:
As you know, I can hear what Pokémon
are saying.
ch0089_90_n/2511_0701_02_10:
That said, I still don’t understand everything
about them.
ch0089_90_n/2511_0701_03_10: Some things words just can’t convey.
ch0089_90_n/2511_0702_01_10:
Language is crucial for communication, but it alone
isn’t enough.
ch0089_90_n/2511_0702_02_10: Sometimes, words can even brew conflict.
ch0089_90_n/2511_0702_03_10:
It’s important to keep living and learning
together—and to try to understand what’s
in each other’s heart.
ch0089_90_n/3001_0701_01_10:
Seeing my friends right after waking up makes me
feel like it’ll be a wonderful day.
ch0089_90_n/3003_0701_01_10:
I feel like I should make good use of my time
here on Pasio... It would feel like such a waste
not to.
ch0089_90_n/3005_0701_01_10:
You’ve worked so hard today. The quiet of the
night should give your mind a chance to relax.
